Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class LinearCombDataSet< T >

A specialization of DataSet, takes a DataSet and outputs a linear combination of its patterns.

This object takes a DataSet and produces a linear combination of its patterns. For instance, taking a DataSet with X patternSize and generates Y patternSize patterns, the object will need a matrix of XxY. However, this matrix will be normally very disperse, so, the object LinearCombConf stores pairs of (index,weight), and has a list of pairs for each Y output element.
